Mike Muscala

Pronunciation: \muss-CALL-uh\

Mike Muscala

(Jawz, Moose, Musky)

Position: Center and Power Forward ▪ Shoots: Right

6-10, 240lb (208cm, 108kg)

Born: July 1, 1991 in St. Louis Park, Minnesota us

College: Bucknell

High School: Roseville in Roseville, Minnesota

Draft: Dallas Mavericks, 2nd round (14th pick, 44th overall), 2013 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: March 2, 2014

Experience: 11 years

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Mike Muscala?

Mike Muscala is 33 years old.

Where was Mike Muscala born?

Mike Muscala was born in St. Louis Park, Minnesota.

When was Mike Muscala born?

Mike Muscala was born on July 1, 1991.

How tall is Mike Muscala?

Mike Muscala is 6-10 (208 cm) tall.

How much does Mike Muscala weigh?

Mike Muscala weighs 240 lbs (108 kg).

Is Mike Muscala in the Hall of Fame?

Mike Muscala is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Mike Muscala drafted?

Mike Muscala was drafted by Dallas Mavericks, 2nd round (14th pick, 44th overall), 2013 NBA Draft.

What position does Mike Muscala play?

Center and Power Forward.

What is Mike Muscala's net worth?

Mike Muscala has made at least $28,263,283 playing professional basketball.

How much does Mike Muscala make?

Mike Muscala made $5,000,000 in 2018.

How many rings does Mike Muscala have?

Mike Muscala has won 0 championships.

What schools did Mike Muscala attend?

Mike Muscala attended Roseville in Roseville, Minnesota and Bucknell.

What are Mike Muscala's nicknames?

Jawz, Moose, Musky are nicknames for Mike Muscala.
